name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KudoHome - Ultimate Guide to Redfin Zillow Realtor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kudohome is a feature-packed Chrome extension that revolutionizes your real estate search experience. Whether you're buying or renting, Kudohome helps you make informed decisions by adding a wealth of additional data to real estate websites like Zillow, Redfin, and Realtor.
Our extension enhances your browsing experience with valuable neighborhood information, including street view, local traffic data, noise levels, and crime maps. It also highlights critical hazards, such as Superfund sites, allowing you to avoid undesirable properties without extensive research.
We've added features like neighborhood median income and ethnicity data to further assist in your real estate search. With Kudohome, you can make better-informed decisions with ease.
